contest-event.event-date:
Nov. 24, 2018 D Swiss National Championships (Elite Division)
Swiss National Championships (Elite Division) 1 Test Piece Contest Swiss National Championships swiss-national-championships-elite-division
The 2 last ranked Bands will be relegated to First Section in the following Year.
Destination Moon
Music and Convention Centre (Auditorium Stravinski), Montreux, VD, Switzerland 1st Edition (new Section)
Bands set for this Premiere after their Results of the last 3 Years in the First Section. Mode: Planned to relegate the last two Bands in the Ranking to First Section.
Commence 11 am.
Best Bariton: Régis Gobet, Ensemble de Cuivres Euphonia
March 24, 2018, 6:19 p.m. Nov. 27, 2018, 11:44 a.m.
1 Brass Band Emmental Jan Müller
2 Ensemble de Cuivres Euphonia Michael Bach
3 Brass Band Imperial Lenzburg Rafael Camartin
4 Brass Band MG Rickenbach Enrico Calzaferri
5 Brass Band Fricktal Adrian Schneider
